sen.j: 深見トンネル（ふかみトンネル）は京都府京都市右京区と同府南丹市に跨るトンネルである。
sen.e: The Fukami Tunnel is the tunnel streching over Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Minami-Tanba City. (Kyoto Prefecture)
The Fukami Tunnel is the tunnel running between Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Minami-Tanba City (Kyoto Prefecture).
sen.cmt: running between に訂正しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The Fukami Tunnel is the tunnel running between Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Minami-Tanba City (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: （国道162号旧道のトンネルは深見隧道を参照）
sen.e: (Refer to the article for the tunnels of the old National Road No. 162, including the details of the former Fukami-zuido Tunnel)
(Refer to the article for the tunnels of the old National Road No. 162, including the details of the former Fukami-zuido Tunnel.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: (Refer to the article for the tunnels of the old National Road No. 162, including the details of the former Fukami-zuido Tunnel.)

sen.j: 国道162号深見峠の直下を貫くトンネルである。
sen.e: The Fukami Tunnel is the tunnel for the National Road No. 162, running directly beneath the Fukami Pass.
The Fukami Tunnel is the tunnel for the National Road No. 162, running directly beneath the Fukami Pass.
The Fukami Tunnel is the tunnel for the National Road No. 162, running directly beneath the Fukami Pass.

sen.j: 2001年9月に開通した歴史の浅いトンネルである。
sen.e: This tunnel has a short operation history as it was opened for traffic in September, 2001.
This tunnel has a short operation history as it was opened for traffic in September, 2001.
This tunnel has a short operation history as it was opened for traffic in September, 2001.

sen.j: 旧道である深見隧道は現在では通行不能であり、バリケードが張られている。
sen.e: The former Fukami-zuido Tunnel for the old National Road No.162 was blocked for passing through by setting up a barricade.
The former Fukami-zuido Tunnel for the old National Road No.162 was blocked for passing through by setting up a barricade.
The former Fukami-zuido Tunnel for the old National Road No.162 was blocked for passing through by setting up a barricade.

sen.j: 延長1034m、幅員10.5mの高規格な造りとなっており、照明も多く圧迫感はほとんど感じられない。
sen.e: The new Fukami Tunnel has the length of 1034m, while it is constructed in higher standard in specification by providing 10.5m width for the tunnel and equipped with many illuminations, allowing to reduce the sense of tightness inside of the tunnel space.

The new Fukami Tunnel has the length of 1034m, while it is constructed in higher standard in specification by providing 10.5m width for the tunnel and equipped with many illuminations, allowing to reduce the sense of tightness inside of the tunnel space.

The new Fukami Tunnel has the length of 1034m, while it is constructed in higher standard in specification by providing 10.5m width for the tunnel and equipped with many illuminations, allowing to reduce the sense of tightness inside of the tunnel space.

sen.j: またトンネルの両側の坑門に出口附近の道路地図が描かれている。
sen.e: The road maps of the entrance areas of this tunnel are placed at both ends of the tunnel.
The road maps of the entrance areas of this tunnel are placed at both ends of the tunnel.
The road maps of the entrance areas of this tunnel are placed at both ends of the tunnel.

sen.j: 片側1車線の確保された広い道路を有するトンネルである。
sen.e: This tunnel houses a spacious two-lane road.
This tunnel houses a spacious two-lane road.
This tunnel houses a spacious two-lane road.

sen.j: 歩道も整備されており、ハイキングやサイクリングなどを楽しむ人にも配慮された造りとなっている。
sen.e: The tunnel also houses a sidewalk designed for those people who enjoy walking and bicycling on this road.
The tunnel also houses a sidewalk designed for those people who enjoy walking and bicycling on this road.
The tunnel also houses a sidewalk designed for those people who enjoy walking and bicycling on this road.

sen.j: 福井県と京都府を結ぶ幹線道路である国道162号にある為、交通量は非常に多い。
sen.e: The traffic volume of this tunnel is very high as it was built for the National Road No. 162, the trunk road connecting Fukui Prefecture and Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 福井県と京都府を結ぶ幹線道路である国道162号にある為、交通量は非常に多い。が正しいため、原文を修正しました。
sen.e: The traffic volume of this tunnel is very high as it was built for the National Road No. 162, the trunk road connecting Fukui Prefecture and Kyoto Prefecture.
The traffic volume of this tunnel is very high as it was built for the National Road No. 162, the trunk road connecting Fukui Prefecture and Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 特に夏はツーリング (オートバイ)のバイクが多く通行するトンネルである。
sen.e: During the summer season, the traffice volume of touring motorcycles is particularly high.
During the summer season, the traffic volume of touring motorcycles is particularly high.
During the summer season, the traffic volume of touring motorcycles is particularly high.

sen.j: 京都府京都市右京区上弓削町-同府南丹市美山町深見
sen.e: Kamiyuge-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture - Miyama-cho Fukami, Minami-Tanba City, Kyoto Prefecture
Kamiyuge-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture - Miyama-cho Fukami, Minami-Tanba City, Kyoto Prefecture
